LanguageData.Apparello_Trypophobia.label: Trader's coat
LanguageData.Apparello_Trypophobia.description: What is a trader? A miserable little pile of bags -Count Dravania, moments before being lynched by an angry mob.
LanguageData.Apparel_Jacket.label: Jacket
LanguageData.Apparel_Jacket.description: A tough jacket to stop scrapes and bruises, and to keep one warm in chilly weather.
LanguageData.Apparel_Parka.label: Parka
LanguageData.Apparel_Parka.description: A thick parka for staying warm in the coldest of temperatures.
LanguageData.Apparel_ParkaB.label: Quilted Jacket
LanguageData.Apparel_ParkaB.description: A quilted jacket for staying warm in the coldest of temperatures.
LanguageData.Apparel_Duster.label: Duster
LanguageData.Apparel_Duster.description: A long duster coat for blocking the sun and grit of the desert.
LanguageData.Apparel_Cassie.label: Blazer
LanguageData.Apparel_Cassie.description: A more casual approach to a suit jacket, blazers are often worn as a formal uniform.
LanguageData.Apparello_PonPon.label: Poncho
LanguageData.Apparello_PonPon.description: A gunslinger's second best friend, right after the six shooter and Ten-Gallon Stetson! No, wait make that the third best friend.
